name: Like a rat in a maze
name_original: Like a rat in a maze
description:
Made for the Apocalypse Jam 2022.

NOTE! The sound volume is a bit loud so please turn down your PC's volume! This will be fixed in next version.

NOTE 2! There are flashing lights in the game

Still overscoped so it's just a little and not quite finished. :P

Game programming and design by me.
Support and planning by Martin Lorentzon (yeah you're plank wasn't implemented but will be in future versions).
Assets by Lotta Li Alftberg.
Other assets from Sketchfab.

THE RAT was made by ARtise1. "Rat" (https://skfb.ly/o9DGW) is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
